Read the Mid-November issue of Investment Executive
 
 

The Mid- November issue of Investment Executive is available now in print and online.
 
 
Read the digital edition
 
 
 

In our latest issue, a much-maligned regulator goes under the microscope and we re-examine the captive insurance advisor model following developments at Sun Life. Don’t miss our Special Report on Retirement, with stories on TFSAs in retirement, timing government benefits, decluttering for retirees, advisor succession , and much more. Finally, we review the implications of Montreal’s mayoral election.
